text: Hopea chinensis is a species of medium-sized tree ( tall) in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is found in China (S and SW Guangxi, S and SE Yunnan) and northern Vietnam. Hopea chinensis is an endangered species threatened by exploitation of its durable timber. In China it is under first-class national protection. It also produces hopeachinols C and D.Polyphenolic Acetylcholinesterase Inhibitors from Hopea chinensis. Tong Yan, Ting Wang, Wei Wei, Nan Jiang, Yan Hua Qin, Ren Xiang Tan and Hui Ming Ge, Planta Med, 2012, volume 78, issue 10, pages 1015-1019, ==References== chinensis Category:Trees of China Category:Trees of Vietnam Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea chinensis
